name: R2D2Talk
0:
”Alexa, open r two d two talk”
”Alexa, launch r two d two talk”
”Alexa, ask r two d two talk if I am the senate”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: r. two d. two talk
des:
The R2D2 talk skill is a novelty skill which allows you to talk to the iconic droid through Alexa!

With various responses, the skills is perfect for a bit of fun and showing off to your friends!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
